content.question: Using the excerpt, respond to parts a, b, and c. Briefly describe the point of view of the author of the excerpt. Briefly explain how one historical development from 1946 to 1960 provides a helpful context for understanding the response to the questionnaire. Briefly explain how one social movement that developed in the period from 1960 to 1980 responded to attitudes such as those expressed in the excerpt.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
